summary: A pencil sketch progression app that applies 5-stage sketch effects to uploaded images. Currently fixing error message display issues.
known_issues: 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' and 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' error messages appearing in UI need to be cleared/hidden

existing_features.title: Remove or suppress the 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' error message from the Results page UI. This message should not be displayed to the user under any circumstance — if no job ID is present, redirect silently or show a neutral fallback state instead.

Remove or suppress the 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' error message from the UI. This internal error string must not be shown to users — replace any occurrence with a neutral fallback message or silent error handling.
